G

gameExit() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
This method is meant to be called when the user try to close the window.
gameOver - Variable in class model.MinesweeperModel
true if the game has been won or lost by the player.
getDimensions() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Returns the dimensions of the minefield.
getFlagsPlaced() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Returns the number of flags that are currently in the minefield.
getMinefield() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Returns the 2-dimensional grid of Space objects used to store data about each location in the minefield.
getNumberofMines() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Returns the number of mines that are in the minefield.
getPlayerWon() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Returns whether or not the player has won.
getSpacesRevealed() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Returns the number of spaces revealed by the player so far.
getTime() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Returns the current time elapsed in seconds.
getTurns() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Returns the number of steps taken by the player so far.
